t: Home | Brand Center | The University of Kansas
s: KU’s Brand Center provides guidance on the university’s brand strategy, messaging, visual identity, editorial standards, social media presence, and more. Visitors can explore KU’s brand platform, review guidelines, submit logo and stationery requests, and download design assets.

t: Unit identity - KU brand - The University of Kansas
s: In response, we have created guidelines ... the KU brand. KU units derive their identities from their affiliation with the larger university. Therefore, creation of unit logos is not permitted. t: Official marks - KU brand - The University of Kansas
s: The Jayhawk may be used as an alternative to the KU logo. ... An official mark should appear on all external university communications, including the front or back cover of all folded print materials. In most cases, a mark is meant only to identify, not to serve as a primary design element.
